# `RecordingInput` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | No | Unique identifier for the input. |
| title | `string` | No | The main text displayed for the input field(s). |
| subtitle | `string` | No | Additional text providing more details about the input field(s). |
| responseText | `string` | No | Text response from end customer. |
